articles.title: Oil giant Shell beats second-quarter profit expectations, launches share buyback program - CNBC
articles.description: Shell on Thursday posted stronger-than-expected second-quarter profit after issuing a warning over lower fossil fuel prices and refining margins.

articles.author: Michael Nderitu
articles.title: Bitcoin sell pressure mounts – Here are the main reasons why - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: If you are wondering why Bitcoin is not extending its rally despite expectations of $70k+ prices, here are some answers.
articles.content:
• After a euphoric rise last week, Bitcoin has fallen, influenced by negative news.
  • Bitcoins longs started getting liquidated, which could be another troubling sign for the king coin.

articles.description: Decision follows vastly lowered target and delay in pricing
